name: CGA Mibend4
author: Exidelo
description:
Altered
 version of the CGA mode 5 palette at high intensity (CGA PALETTE 2 
(HIGH) on here). The colours were modified to all have closer values to 
each other, to have a relationship between the red and white, to have a 
relationship the between the cyan and black, and to have an overall hue 
shift to red-orange (I call it minium). The name of the palette derives 
from Minium, Bend (as in colour/hue bend), and the number of colours in 
it. The aim is to create a palette with similar limitations to the 
original, but with more flexibility and natural colour schemes.
